item.text: Masters, treat your slaves with justice and fairness, because you know that you also have a master in heaven.
Be devoted to prayer, keeping alert in it with thanksgiving.

<st data-num="260">At the same time</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> may <st data-num="455" class="">open</st> a <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> for the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="3" /> so that we may <st data-num="2980" class="">proclaim</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> I <st data-num="1210">am in chains</st>.<n id="5" />

Pray <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> I may <st data-num="5319" class="">make</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="5319" class="">known</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">should</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="4043" class="">Conduct</st> yourselves<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outsiders</st>, <st data-num="1805">making the most</st> of the <st data-num="2540" class="">opportunities</st>.
Let your speech always be gracious, seasoned with salt, so that you may know how you should answer everyone.
Tychicus, a dear brother, faithful minister, and fellow slave in the Lord, will tell you all the news about me.

I <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="846">very</st> purpose <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> you may <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">how</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> are doing<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> that he may <st data-num="3870" class="">encourage</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>.
I sent him with Onesimus, the faithful and dear brother, who is one of you. They will tell you about everything here.
Aristarchus, my fellow prisoner, sends you greetings, as does Mark, the cousin of Barnabas (about whom you received instructions; if he comes to you, welcome him).

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> who is <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> <st data-num="2459" class="">Justus</st> also sends greetings. In terms of <st data-num="1537 4061">Jewish converts</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> are the <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> <st data-num="4904">fellow workers</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, and <st data-num="3748">they</st> have <st data-num="1096" class="">been</st> a <st data-num="3931" class="">comfort</st> to <st data-num="1473">me</st>.

<st data-num="1889" class="">Epaphras</st>, who is one <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> and a <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="782" class="">greets</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. He is <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="75" class="">struggling</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayer</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">behalf</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="5046" class="">mature</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> fully <st data-num="4135" class="">assured</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I can <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="4192" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">hard</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for those <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2993" class="">Laodicea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2404" class="">Hierapolis</st>.

Our <st data-num="27">dear friend</st> <st data-num="3065" class="">Luke</st> the <st data-num="2395" class="">physician</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1214" class="">Demas</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="782" class="">greet</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Give</st> my <st data-num="782" class="">greetings</st> to the <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st><n id="1" /> who are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2993" class="">Laodicea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3564" class="">Nympha</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> that meets in <st data-num="846" class="">her</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3752">after</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> this <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st>, have it <st data-num="314" class="">read</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> of <st data-num="2993" class="">Laodicea</st>. <st data-num="2532">In turn</st>, <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> the <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2993" class="">Laodicea</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">as well</st>.
And tell Archippus, â€œSee to it that you complete the ministry you received in the Lord.â€
I, Paul, write this greeting by my own hand. Remember my chains. Grace be with you.
